intent_atoms.description: VoiceOver regression pass for accessibility shortcuts must confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.
Schedule macOS and iPadOS hardware verification to confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets.
Real‑world assets (Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC‑4, MPEG‑H) must be secured so regression baselines can shift from synthetic payloads once approvals land.
Secure Dolby Vision, AV1… etc. awaiting licensing approvals.
Snapshot and CLI fixtures should refresh whenever schema updates are intentional via ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSH?.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Verify that focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Secure licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC‑4, and MPEG‑H fixtures to enable regression baselines with real-world media

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Maintenance
functional_units.description: Refresh JSON export snapshots and command‑line interface fixtures when schema updates occur using the ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS environment variable

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing Metrics UI in SwiftUI
